name: belza.digital
description: The corporate website of Belza Digital GmbH

scripts.start: concurrently -k 'npm run -s watch:static' 'npm run -s watch:templates' 'live-server build'
scripts.build:compress: for f in build/*.html; do inline-assets --htmlmin --cssmin --pattern 'css$' --verbose $f $f; done
scripts.build: npm run -s build:clean && npm run -s build:static && bin/compile
scripts.predeploy: npm run -s build && npm run -s build:compress && rm -f build/*.css

author: Martin Belza
